author: Nashville Tennessean, Natalie Neysa Alund, Nashville Tennessean
title: 'Chrisley Knows Best' star Todd Chrisley hospitalized for days after COVID-19 diagnosis
description: "Chrisley Knows Best" star Todd Chrisley said his battle with coronavirus made him "the sickest I have ever been."
content:
If you can't purchase a mask, here's how to make one from a t-shirt.
USA TODAY
Reality TV star Todd Chrisley is recovering after testing positive for COVID-19, he and his family confirmed.
The "Chrisley Knows Best" star told fans he contracted the virus du… [+2638 chars]
